Articles.Content:
So Im fairly new to this forum but not to ksp. I've been trying to make a modded ksp but some of the mods are not working correctly or are conflicting with other mods (pun not intended). So I was wondering if anyone could get me a gamedata folder that will work with ksp 1.1.3 that has the following mods...

B9 Aerospace

Extraplanetary Lauchpads

Kerbal Atomics

Kerbal Engineer

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

Kerbaltek

Kerbal Inventory System

Kontainers*

KW Rocketry

Infernal Robotics

Mechjeb2

Near Future Electrical/Props/Propulsion/Solar/Spacecraft

Planetary Base Systems

Planet Shine

Reactor Pack*

SCANsat

Smoke Screen - I dont exactly know what this does or what it came with, but it was included with one of the mod installs.

Texture Replacer - with Green Skull Texture Pack

Tweak Scale

FTT*

FX*

Karbonite*

Karbonite+*

Kolonization*

Konstruction*

UKS*

*All of these marked mods are under USI or Umbra Space Industries

Module Manager

If anyone can do this for me I will be very thankful.

Edited September 25, 2016 by Conflict-Gaming

Welcome aboard!

Several of those mods have licenses which forbid redistribution, it would not be proper for someone to send them to you.

Your best bet is to install them one at a time and confirm they are working, or use CKAN to automate their installation.
CKAN Works great! thanks for the help.
